summary: Completed comprehensive testing of all 12 commerce module list pages. Backend APIs (18/18 tests passed) are fully functional. Frontend pages for Catalog (5 pages) and Governance (5 pages) are working correctly with live data. Revenue Leads page works but uses different component. Procurement page has a bug - using wrong API endpoint.

ui_bugs.issue: Using wrong API endpoint '/api/commerce/procure' instead of '/api/commerce/modules/procurement/requests'
Using wrong token key 'token' instead of 'access_token' from localStorage

integration_issues.issue: Procurement list page shows 'Total Procurements: 5' in stats but table is empty because API endpoint is incorrect

console_warnings.issue: React warning: Each child in a list should have a unique 'key' prop

revenue_leads_list.note: Uses LeadListFinal component with different layout (Lead Pipeline)

action_items: FIX: Update ProcureListElite.jsx to use correct API endpoint '/api/commerce/modules/procurement/requests' instead of '/api/commerce/procure'
FIX: Update ProcureListElite.jsx to use 'access_token' instead of 'token' from localStorage
MINOR: Add unique key prop to list items in LeadListFinal.jsx to fix React warning
critical_code_review_comments: ProcureListElite.jsx line 19: API endpoint '/api/commerce/procure' does not exist - should be '/api/commerce/modules/procurement/requests'
ProcureListElite.jsx line 19: Using localStorage.getItem('token') but auth system uses 'access_token'
ProcurementList.jsx exists with correct API endpoint but is not being used in routes - App.js imports ProcureListElite instead
seed_data_creation: Created test catalog item and lead during CRUD tests (cleaned up after)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs at /api/commerce/modules/* are working correctly. Catalog (5 pages) and Governance (5 pages) frontend list pages are fully functional with live data, search, and filters. Revenue Leads uses LeadListFinal component (different from LeadsList.jsx in reference). Procurement page (ProcureListElite.jsx) needs fix - wrong API endpoint and token key. The correct ProcurementList.jsx exists but is not used in routes.
